item.title: Notes from the Underground
item.author: Darije Custovic,
item.description: “I am a sick man… I am an angry man. I am an unattractive man.” This is the opening line of Dostoyevsky’s early work Notes From the Underground. They are the words of the unnamed narrator, the fictive author of the titular notes written from “underground” – his term for his own self-imposed …
